title: Implement Web Share API
body: Web Share API landed on Chrome for Android in version 61. It's a neat way of providing native sharing hooks to a web app.

comments.body: The spec has now stablized and is implemented in Chrome on Android, and is now implemented in the next version of mobile Safari for iOS.
Shipped in every other browser yet you change the status to "Not currently planned"? Eurgh. You truly are trying to be the new Internet Explorer!!!

Here is a primer: https://developers.google.com/web/updates/2016/09/navigator-share
Here is the Firefox Tracker for this: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1312422
Spec in GitHub: https://github.com/WICG/web-share
